title: DSC 106: Interactive Map Visualization for Bluebikes Data
description: Developed an interactive Mapbox visualization to display real-time bike station traffic using D3.js and JavaScript.

title: CSE 190D: Mitigating Bias in Machine Learning
description: Implemented fairness interventions through massaging, reweighting, and post-processing; achieved equalized TPR/FPR across gender biased groups.

title: CSE 156: Fine-Tuning RoBERTa for Sentiment Analysis on SST-2
description: Implemented custom PyTorch class for preprocessing and batch text; developed sentiment analysis pipeline using pre-trained RoBERTa-base transformer, fine-tuning on SST-2 dataset.

title: DSC 106: Data Visualization of Male Mice Thermal Regulation
description: Designed visualizations to analyze half-daily and bi-hourly temperature fluctuations in male mice over 13 days, illustrating the effects of light-on and light-off conditions.

title: CSE 158R: MusicXML Song Complexity Prediction
description: Implemented Logistic Regression and Decision Tree models that achieved 86.38% accuracy on validation sets. Summarized results in a comprehensive 11-page, 2-column report.

title: CSE 158R: Goodreads Book Recommender
description: Personalized recommendation system for Goodreads, Cornac BPR model was optimized with latent factor tuning and regularization, ranking 16th out of 711 competitors on leaderboard.

title: COGS 108: Steam Games Ratings Prediction
description: Integrated Steam and IGN Games datasets to predict game ratings. Developed and evaluated OLS regression models to determine features' contribution.

title: DSC 80: Food.com Recipe Analysis
description: Analyzed the relationship between recipe ratings and attributes such as preparation time, ingredients, and steps using multiple linear regression and ridge regression.

title: CSE 151A: Rice Classification
description: Classified 75,000 rice images using pairwise logistic regressions and artificial neural network with optimized layers and activation functions.

title: MATH 173A: SVM with Gradient Descent
description: Developed a custom SVM classifier from scratch to separate clusters; implemented hinge loss gradient computation for optimization and SGD for classification error minimization.
